David Saff wrote:

> On 7/12/07, Cédric Beust ♔ <cbeust@... 
> <mailto:cbeust%40google.com>> wrote:
>  > Interesting thought, but an advantage of string groups is that you can
>  > run your tests by specifying group regexps (very powerful).
> 
> Regular expressions work on class names, right?

Yes, but regular strings do have the advantage of arbitrary 
expressibility, whereas ClassNamesHaveToLookLikeThisWhichSucks.
